TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PathTooLongException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 当路径名或完全限定的文件名长度超过系统定义的最大长度时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a path or fully qualified file name is longer than the system-defined maximum length.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的代码不具有权限，错误消息，此异常可能包含唯一的文件或目录名称而不是完整路径。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may contain only file or directory names instead of full paths. 在之前的.NET Framework 版本下运行的应用中[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，完整路径长度不得超过 260 个字符，为了保持与 Windows 操作系统的兼容性。In apps that run under versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], full paths must not exceed 260 characters to maintain compatibility with Windows operating systems. 超过 260 个字符的任何路径自动引发。Any path in excess of 260 characters automatically throws a . 有关此限制的详细信息，请参阅文章[.NET 中的长路径](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163666)BCL 团队博客中。For more information about this restriction, see the entry [Long Paths in .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163666) in the BCL Team blog. > [!NOTE] > 此异常未包含在[.NET for Windows Store 应用](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912)或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)，但它将引发的某些成员。This exception is not included in [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), but it is thrown by some members that are. 若要在这种情况下捕获异常，编写`catch`处理的语句相反。To catch the exception in that case, write a `catch` statement that handles an instead. 从下运行的应用开始[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]，.NET Framework 支持长路径超过 260 (或`MAX_PATH`) 字符。Starting with apps running under the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)], the .NET Framework supports long paths in excess of 260 (or `MAX_PATH`) characters. 在其下的条件引发异常取决于.NET Framework 的版本的应用面向：The conditions under which a exception are thrown depend on the version of the .NET Framework that an app targets: **面向应用[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]及更高版本****Apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] and later versions** 默认情况下支持长的路径。Long paths are supported by default. 则运行时会引发以下情况下：The runtime throws a under the following conditions: - 操作系统返回 `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG` 或其等同项。The operating system returns `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG` or its equivalent. - 路径长度超过(32,767) 个字符。The length of the path exceeds (32,767) characters. **面向应用[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]及更早版本****Apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] and earlier versions** 默认情况下，禁用长路径，并且旧行为会保留。Long paths are disabled by default, and the legacy behavior is maintained. 则运行时会引发每当路径超过 260 个字符。The runtime throws a whenever a path exceeds 260 characters. 如果不希望这样，应用程序，面向[!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)]和更早版本，但运行[!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)]可以启用通过包含中的以下设置的长路径支持[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)的应用程序的元素配置文件：If this is undesirable, apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v461](~/includes/net-v461-md.md)] and earlier but run under the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/includes/net-v462-md.md)] can enable long path support by including the following setting in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) element of the application configuration file: ```xml ``` 使用 HRESULT `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG`，它具有值 0x800700CE。 uses the HRESULT `COR_E_PATHTOOLONG`, which has the value 0x800700CE.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，使其 HRESULT 设置为 COR_E_PATHTOOLONG。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its HRESULT set to COR_E_PATHTOOLONG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的消息的错误进行描述，例如"提供的路径过长。"的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The supplied path is too long." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，使其消息字符串设置为 ，而其 HRESULT 设置为 COR_E_PATHTOOLONG。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to and its HRESULT set to COR_E_PATHTOOLONG.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的新实例使用`message`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message`.

param.name: message

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. `InnerException` 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 `InnerException`。The `InnerException` property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the `InnerException` property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 有关内部异常的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on inner exceptions, see .
